markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Gref](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2476)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Gref](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2476)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 34

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[crossbow with 10 bolts](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [Katar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=14), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Snake Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=136) (2), [Tindertwig](/Equipment.aspx?ID=138)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
katar +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +10 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Cheek Pouches**   A ratfolk smuggler has stretchy cheek pouches that can store up to 1 cubic foot of objects (though no more than 4 light items). The ratfolk can remove or store an item using the Interact action. As long as the ratfolk has at least one object in its cheek pouches, its speech is noticeably difficult to understand.

**Katar Specialist**   The smugglers have trained extensively with the katar blade. Any katar they wield gains the [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) trait.

**Quick Stow** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per round. **Effect** The ratfolk smuggler stores one held item of light or negligible Bulk in its cheek pouches.

**Swarming**   A ratfolk smuggler can end its movement in the same square as an ally that also has this ability. Only two such creatures can share the same space

</column>
name: Gref
primary_source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 34
